last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: On the day of the big occasion, Jun-yeong’s family is surprised to see him returning to the house. Su-jae and Ju-ran take a trip before her surgery.

name: The Third Charm
overview: The twelve-year love story of two individuals with completely opposite personalities who unexpectedly met on a group blind date.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When he initially meets Lee Yeong-jae, On Jun-yeong only sees traits he dislikes in women. But he realizes that first impressions aren’t everything.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Jun-yeong lays out a meticulous plan for his date with Yeong-jae and later invites her to an event hosted by his department at school.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Still feeling hurt after seven years, Jun-yeong finds Yeong-jae’s nonchalant attitude maddening but life is more complicated than he’d surmised.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: After a gap of seven years, day two of Yeong-jae and Jun-yeong’s relationship finally begins, but Jun-yeong finds that dating has its own challenges.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Jun-yeong uses his detective skills to investigate Yeong-jae’s attractive client. After a stressful day, Yeong-jae goes out with a new acquaintance.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Jun-yeong’s anxieties persist after the fashion show. Yeong-jae wonders why Jun-yeong hasn’t called on her birthday when Choe Ho-cheol stops by.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Yeong-jae and Jun-yeong deal with the consequences of their fights. The police station welcomes a new officer who shares some of Jun-yeong's quirks.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Yeong-jae takes offense at Jun-yeong’s reaction to her photo spread. Jun-yeong’s team tries to capture a dangerous criminal with Min Se-eun’s help.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Yeong-jae begins to feel uncertain about her relationship with Jun-yeong and seeks Ju-ran’s advice. Ho-cheol has something to say to Jun-yeong.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Yeong-jae knows how she feels about Jun-yeong, even while he grows more desperate. Ju-ran reluctantly goes to the movies with Su-jae.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Jun-yeong’s sudden decision upsets his parents, but he finds a new career path while traveling in Portugal, where he later runs into a familiar face.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Jun-yeong and Se-eun start thinking about the future, but he later learns through a chance meeting that Yeong-jae is facing big changes of her own.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Jun-yeong introduces Se-eun as his fiancée to Yeong-jae. Jun-yeong and Se-eun talk about returning to Lisbon. Ju-ran gets shocking news at the hospital.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Jun-yeong and Se-eun visit her hometown to meet her family, but they later end up having their first fight. Ju-ran asks Yeong-jae for a favor.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: While their families get ready to meet one another, Se-eun deals with Jun-yeong’s confession. Yeong-jae assures Jun-yeong that she’ll be okay.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: On the day of the big occasion, Jun-yeong’s family is surprised to see him returning to the house. Su-jae and Ju-ran take a trip before her surgery.
